DOC.brief_summary: On EAU ( European Association Urology ) guideline , ulcer type bladder pain syndrome ( BPS ) treat transurethral resection ( TUR ) coagulation ( TUC ) ulcer . But , Up date , study compare therapeutic efficacy TUR TUC ulcer type BPS patient . We assume TUR therapeutic effect TUC .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Efficacy Between Transurethral Coagulation Transurethral Resection Ulcer Bladder Pain Syndrome Patients
DOC.criteria: 1 . Male female age 18 yr great 2 . Patients diagnose BPS ( Bladder Pain Syndrome ) 3 . Symptom persist 6 month 4 . Pain VAS â‰¥4 5 . O'LearySant Interstitial Cystitis questionnaire ( ICQ ) score 12 great pain nocturia domain score > 2 . 6 . Pelvic Pain Urgency/Frequency Patient Symptom Scale ( PUF ) > 13 7 . No history cystoscopy within 2yrs . 1 . History augmentation cystoplasty previous transurethral coagulation/resection due BPS 2 . Childbearing potential , pregnant nursing woman . 3 . Mean void volume lesser 40ml 400ml . 4 . Hematuria exceed 1+ urinary dipstick ( dipstick ) examination . 5 . Urinary tract infection runin period . 6 . Genitourinary tuberculosis bladder , urethral prostate cancer 7 . Recurrent urinary tract infection 8 . History hysterectomy , midurethral sling , pelvic organ prolapse repair , vaginal delivery Cesarean section , prostate operation treatment etc within 6months . 9 . Neurologic disease history cerebral infarction , multiple sclerosis parkinsonism etc .
